name: Mixity Concoction
description:
Mixity concoction is a game where you play as an alchemist, collecting ingredients and brewing potions, which can lead to some unexpected results.,

It is still a bit unfinished, as I didn't have much time, but I hope you like it!

IMPORTANT!  There is no menu as of now and to exit the game you have to press Alt+F4. Black screen for a few seconds at the start of the game is also normal.

I'm still learning bevy so it was hard to code everything on time.

Controls:
WASD - move around
E - pick up ingredients and items from the ground
Right click - move camera around
Mouse wheel - zoom camera
You can use your cursor and click and drag items in the foreground

How to play:

Collect ingredients, mash them up, and throw them in the cauldron.
To eat or drink just drag the item towards the character's head

You can see full code on https://github.com/HotCrowBar/mixity-concoction
